Costume 
  public Costume()

getCelNamed 
  public CostumeSegmentCel getCelNamed(String segmentName,
                                       String orientationName,
                                       String celName)
Returns the CostumeSegmentCel in the specified orientation with the given name, or null if none.
getDefaultCel 
  public CostumeSegmentCel getDefaultCel(String segmentName,
                                         String orientationName)
Returns the default cel to use for the specified segment and orientation. If there are no cels for this segment at all, returns null.
getDefaultCel 
  public CostumeSegmentCel getDefaultCel(String segmentName)
Returns the default cel to use for the specified segment in an unspecified orientation. This should only be called out of desperation, when there was nothing defined for the desired orientation.
getPositionNamed 
  public Position getPositionNamed(String positionName)
Returns a position matching this name, or null if none. Searches in the costume's choreography first, then in the structure's choreography.
getCostumePositionNamed 
  public Position getCostumePositionNamed(String positionName)
Returns a position matching this name, or null if none. Searches only in the costume's choreography. To also search in the structure's choreography, call getPositionNamed instead.
getSegmentNamed 
  public CostumeSegment getSegmentNamed(String segmentName,
                                        String orientationName)
Returns the CostumeSegment in the specified orientation with the given name, or null if none.
getName 
  public String getName()
setName 
  public void setName(String newName)
